name: split-geojson
prepare-dropdown
filter-track
unix time
randomize
func:
var max = 1000
var min = -1000
random = Math.random() * (max - min) + min
random = random * 0.0000001
msg.payload.geojson.geometry.coordinates[0] = msg.payload.geojson.geometry.coordinates[0] + random
msg.payload.geojson.geometry.coordinates[1] = msg.payload.geojson.geometry.coordinates[1] + random
return msg;

name: Optimize msg
Shape msg
func:
out = {}
out.time = msg.payload['Time (s)']
out.lat = msg.payload['Latitude (°)']
out.lon = msg.payload['Longitude (°)']
out.alt = msg.payload['Height (m)']
out.h_accuracy = msg.payload['Horizontal Accuracy (m)']

msg.payload = out

return msg;
